column4: So is there a way to get a complete package listing of all the packages I have installed?

In Synaptic go to Settings > Filters and unmark all but "Installed", then push the "Custom" button in the lower left corner and choose "Search Filter". Then it should only show your installed packages
You can also add a specific filter for installed packages by choosing "New" while in the Filters dialog and access it under the "Custom" button
I'm looking more for something that'll export into a file.. dpkg -l will do what I need
